page.title: 15Transport
page.content: The main means of transport is by car. The bus service is very limited and there are only 7 services a week along the Shrewsbury to Ironbridge road. The bus service to from Eaton Constantine to Telford runs only twice each week. Because there is so little public transport for the people of the area the villagers have started a{VOLUNTARY CAR SCHEME.}This means that if someone who does not have a car needs to go to one of the nearby towns for medical treatment or some emergency there is a rota of car owners who will take them. The nearest railway stations are in Telford and Shrewsbury. The nearest airport is in Birmingham which is about 40 miles away.
